hymn.title: I'm a vessel this I know

layout.singingstanza: I'm a ves -- sel, this I know! For the Bi -- ble tells me so. God's the Pot -- ter, I'm the clay; He made me this spe -- cial way. Yes, I'm a ves -- sel, Yes, I'm a ves -- sel, Yes, I'm a ves -- sel, The Bi -- ble tells me so.

lyrics.stanza: I'm a vessel, this I know! For the Bible tells me so. God's the Potter, I'm the clay; He made me this special way.
Yes, I'm a vessel, Yes, I'm a vessel, Yes, I'm a vessel, The Bible tells me so.
